current.checkout_heading_font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
current.left_text:
• WHERE'S MY ORDER?
  • ORDER CHANGES OR CANCELLATION
  • SHIPPING & DELIVERY OPTIONS
  • PRINTING METHODS
  • SUBMITTING DESIGNS
  • SPONSORSHIPS
current.middle_text:
WHERE'S MY ORDER?

All shirts are made to order, which means we don’t print them till they are ordered. Orders are produced in the order they are received. During periods of heavy volume, lead times will be longer than other times. Orders typically ship 2-5 days after they are placed. Hoodies typically take longer between 4-7 days.

To see a more detailed look at your order status please visit our Tracking page. Here you will find all your order's details and current status.

Return to top

ORDER CHANGES OR CANCELLATION

If you've made a mistake in your order such as a wrong address, size, or color please let us know as quickly as possible. Typically 1-2 days after your order is placed we can still make the change. Once an order is shipped we cannot help you.

Orders cannot be canceled once shipped. If it’s been 2+ weeks and you haven’t received a shipping confirmation, first check your spam filter, then contact us.

Return to top

SHIPPING & DELIVERY OPTIONS

Domestically we normally ship via USPS offering customers the choice between Priority Mail and Express Mail services. Some items on our site may require a different shipping method such as UPS or DHL.

Priority mail usually takes up to 3-5 business days to arrive to the destination from the time your order is shipped out of our facility. USPS does label how many days it takes for the order to be delivered, but sometimes, there are delays. So please keep in mind that it may take up to 5 business days to receive a package with priority mail service.

Express mail ensures a quicker delivery typically between 1-3 business days from the time your order is shipped out from our facility.

**We are required by State and Federal laws to charge sales tax on products shipped to California.

For International orders, Priority Mail shipping takes up to 7-12 business days to arrive from the time your order is shipped out of our facility. Express mail will take about 4-7 business days from the time your order is shipped out of our facility.

Import duties, taxes, and charges are not included in the item price or shipping cost. These charges are the buyer’s responsibility. We encourage you to please check with your country’s customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to buying so there are no surprises.

Return to top

PRINTING METHODS

We print all our own shirts and only keep in stock the most frequently ordered colors (black, asphalt, navy). Majority of our orders we use direct to garment (DTG) printers. We also may screen print certain orders primarily our custom large volume orders.

Return to top

SUBMITTING DESIGNS

If you have an idea for a design or are an artist that would like to submit a design please reach out to us on social media or through our contact page. All artists will be compensated for their work if we end up using it in any form.

Return to top

SPONSORSHIPS

Currently we are on an invite only basis. If we haven't spoken before and you believe there's a great opportunity for us both then we'd love to hear from you. You can reach us at support@ownaj.com.

Return to top
current.retuen_text:
Returns & Exchanges

We recommend you contact us prior to ordering to ensure you order the correct item.

Our goal is for you to be satisfied with your purchase. If, for any reason, you are not, we are more than willing to do an exchange or issue you store credit. We do not accept returns for refunds.

You may exchange it for a different color, size or style. You have 7 days from when your order was received to return the item(s) to make an exchange (i.e. If your order was delivered on the 1st, you have until the 8th to contact us about making a return).

STEP 1

Prior to exchanging the item(s):

Contact us via e-mail to inform us of your return.

Email: support@ownaj.com

PLEASE NOTE: NO EXCHANGES will be eligible on sale and significantly discounted items varying from 30-50% marked down prices. (including but not limited to: Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and items displayed under the “Sale” section).

Ownaj Clothing Co. reserves the right to refuse exchanges requested from orders made on special sales and from items purchased under the Sale Category on our site. THESE SALES ARE FINAL.

STEP 2

After receiving confirmation for your return, and a return address, you may ship your items. Please include a note of what you'd like to swap your item for.

Items must be returned in their original unwashed condition free from odors, stains, and pet hair. We reserve the right to refuse an exchange if the items show any signs of wear, alterations, misuse or damage. We do not cover the return shipping cost, but exchanges will be shipped out at no additional cost.

STEP 3

Once your return is received, your new item(s) will be shipped out at no additional cost or store credit will be issued via email.

Have other questions about your return? Contact us.

settings.announcement_text: Free Shipping on all orders over $65

settings.html: Grow your brand with original and unique products by creating and selling your merchandise with us.
settings.label:

your Own
settings.subtext: Receive exclusive subscriber only discounts and news

settings.code:
Bring your brand
to life with,

Unique awesome,
merchandise

We make the eCommerce process as easy as possible for you
to get your creations out into the hands of your audience. It's important for us to offer unique products at a fair price.
We work closely with talented and imaginative creators to help design, manufacture, and bring their ideas to life! We're a full service company which handles customer service, manufacturing, selling, and shipping of all our Partner's merchandise.

Contact us to learn more
